author: Miguel Cervantes
comment: Good concept but the execution is not quite there. App crashes very frequently (e.g. when rerouting) and is not at all reliable - I ride a motorcycle and was looking to use my SmartWatch 2 as GPS display. Also the arrows do not turn green as you approach turns/junctions with Google Maps. Please improve the app and it will be a really useful piece of software but as it stands it shouldn't really be here for sale.
title: Very buggy and frequently crashes

author: Itai Shen
comment: Allowed on Accessibility but it's not receiving anything from Google Maps
title: Doesn't seem to work

author: Nii Molai Allotey
comment: Doesn't work and has never worked. Annoyingly, it keeps telling me that is doesn't work aa soon as I switch on my phone.

reply.author: WAppHead
reply.content: Hi thank you for downloading our App. If you downloaded the App before the Update you should reinstall it to proper work as we wrote in the description. If don't please write our Support an email with special information like device, android-version so if there is an incompatibility we can correct it. Thank you

title: Doesn't work

author: Scott Martin
comment: Works quite well. I've found the symbol doesn't quite match the one in the top left of the phones navigation screen. If it could mirror this icon it would be a great app.  Would also be good if the back light could go off to save battery.  Looking forward to updates.
title: Has potential....

author: Mr. B
comment: Accessibility was checked as on and maps running, but nothing on sw2. Just says waiting for navigation. Why ask us to pay for your app when it doesn't work?
title: Doesn't work

author: Dan Potter
comment: Running Android OS 5. Installed this onto my SW2....just says waiting for navigation, even though I created a route on Google maps
title: Doesn't work
